title: POSTing to a page without actions should result in a 405
body:
### Describe the bug

https://twitter.com/bradgarropy/status/1617733494490423298

If you POST to a page without an action, you should get a 405 response, but instead you get a 200. I could have sworn this already happened, but it doesn't â€” we only 405 in different circumstances

### Reproduction

https://stackblitz.com/edit/sveltejs-kit-template-default-cvxk7v?file=src%2Froutes%2F%2Bpage.svelte,svelte.config.js&terminal=dev
